posts.devNotes: Happy Holidays everybody! This is the site's 3rd Major overhaul. It brings a fresh new layout to multiple pages, introduces the all new Compendium, and a lot of back end improvements.

changes.name: All New Layout
changes.description: The site's had a front to back facelift. The new layout is more modern and easier to navigate.

changes.name: Compendium
changes.description: The Compendium is a new page that will be updated with all the information you need to know about the game and it's terminology.

changes.name: Theme Toggle
changes.description: Huzzah! A dark mode toggle at long last.

changes.name: Back End Improvements
changes.description: The site's back end has been improved to make it easier to update and maintain.
